text: Leshan Normal University (LSNU; ) is a teacher's college in Shizhong District, Leshan, Sichuan, China.Home page . Leshan Normal University. Retrieved on March 14, 2015. "学校地址：四川省乐山市市中区滨河路778号" It was formerly known in English as Leshan Teacher's College (LSTC).Home page. Leshan Teacher's College. March 4, 2004. Retrieved on March 14, 2015. ==Partner Institution== ===Malaysia=== *Universiti Tunku Abdul Rahman ==References== ==External links== * Leshan Normal University ** International student page in English Category:Universities and colleges in Sichuan
title: Leshan Normal University
